Translations.Text: namaazo ki hifaazath karo, bil qusoos darmyaan waali namaaz ki aur Allah ta’ala ke liye ba-adab khade raha karo
agar tumhe khauf ho to paidal hee sahi ya sawaar hee sahi, haan jab aman ho jaaye to Allah ka zikr karo jis tarah ke us ne tumhe us baath ki taleem di jise tum nahi jaante thein

jo log tum mein se fauth ho jaaye aur biwiya chohd jaaye wo wasiyath kar jaaye ke un ki biwiya saal bhar tak fayeda uthaaye, unhe koyi na nikaale, haan agar wo khud nikal jaaye to tum par us mein koyi gunah nahi jo wo apne liye acchaayi se kare, Allah ta’ala ghaalib aur hakeem hai
talaaq waaliyo ko acchi tarah fayeda dena parhezgaaro par laazim hai
Allah ta’ala isi tarah apni aayate tum par zaaher farma raha hai ta ke tum samjho

kya tum ne unhe nahi dekha jo hazaaro ki tedaad mein thein aur mauth ke dar ke maare apne gharo se nikal khade hoe thein, Allah ta’ala ne unhe farmaaya mar jaao, phir unhe zinda kar diya, be-shak Allah ta’ala logo par bada fazl waala hai, lekin aksar log na shukre hai
Allah ki raah mein jihaad karo aur jaan lo ke Allah ta’ala sunta, jaanta hai
aisa bhi koyi hai jo Allah ta’ala ko accha qarz de, bas Allah ta’ala ose bahuth bada chada kar ata farmaaye, Allah hee tangi67 aur kushaadgi68 karta hai aur tum sab osi ki taraf lautaaye jaoge
